 To apply for admission into the Boland TVET College BTC Application Form 2024, kindly follow the link and apply online. All applications must be submitted online

What to Know About the Boland TVET College Application Form Portal

The Boland TVET College BTC Application portal is designed to accept application of candidates seeking for admission into the University. In the portal, applicant can Purchase application form, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slip, check admission list, etc.

Boland TVET College

Boland TVET College is a public Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) institution located in the Western Cape Province of South Africa. The college offers a range of vocational and occupational training programs designed to equip students with practical skills and knowledge relevant to the needs of the industry and society.

Boland TVET College has six campuses located in the following areas:

  • Caledon Campus
  • Paarl Campus
  • Stellenbosch Campus
  • Strand Campus
  • Worcester Campus
  • Head Office Campus in Central Office, Worcester

The college offers a variety of programs across several fields of study, including:

  • Engineering Studies
  • Business Studies
  • Hospitality and Tourism
  • Creative Studies
  • Information and Communication Technology
  • Education and Training

Boland TVET College also offers learnerships, skills programs, and short courses to cater to the diverse learning needs of its students.

The college has a strong commitment to providing access to education and training opportunities for all, regardless of their background or socio-economic status. As such, the college offers financial aid and bursary opportunities to assist students who are experiencing financial difficulties.

Boland TVET College is accredited by the Department of Higher Education and Training and is registered with the South African Qualifications Authority.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the BTC application portal, candidates must;

  • Have Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to BTC on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

Boland TVET College Application Requirements

The admission requirements for Boland TVET College may vary depending on the program and level of study. However, here are some general requirements:
  1. National Certificate (Vocational) Programs:
  • A Grade 9 certificate or equivalent qualification
  • Applicants must be at least 16 years old
  • Some programs may require specific subjects and achievement levels
  1. Report 191 (Nated) Programs:
  • A Grade 12 certificate or equivalent qualification
  • Applicants must meet the minimum admission requirements for the specific program they are applying for
  • Some programs may require specific subjects and achievement levels
  1. NCV and NATED Bridge Programs:
  • A National Certificate (Vocational) Level 4 or Report 191 (Nated) Level 4 certificate or equivalent qualification
  1. Occupational Programs:
  • Applicants must meet the minimum admission requirements for the specific program they are applying for
  • Some programs may require relevant work experience or industry-related qualifications

In addition to the above requirements, applicants may be required to submit certified copies of their academic records, ID, and other relevant documents. Some programs may also require applicants to pass an assessment or interview before being accepted.

How to Apply | Boland TVET College online Application 2024

To apply online to Boland TVET College, follow these steps:
  1. Visit the Boland TVET College website at www.bolandcollege.com.
  2. Click on the “Student Support” tab on the homepage and select “Applications” from the drop-down menu.
  3. On the Applications page, select “Online Application” and choose the program you want to apply for.
  4. Fill in the required information on the online application form and upload the necessary supporting documents.
  5. Submit the online application and wait for a response from the college.

Here is the direct link to the Boland TVET College online application portal:

  • https://www.bolandcollege.com/index.php/apply-online/

Boland TVET College Application Required Documents

To apply to BTC you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into the Boland TVET College, kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.

FAQ about Boland TVET College online Application

How can I apply to Boland TVET College online?

You can apply to Boland TVET College online by visiting their official website and following the application process outlined there.

What are the admission Requirements for Boland TVET College?

The admission requirements for Boland TVET College vary depending on the course or program you are interested in. However, in general, you will need a National Senior Certificate (NSC) or equivalent qualification with the required subjects and grades.

How much does it cost to apply to Boland TVET College?

The cost of applying to Boland TVET College varies depending on the program you are applying for. It is best to visit the official website for up-to-date information on application fees.

When is the application deadline for Boland TVET College?

The application deadline for Boland TVET College varies depending on the program you are applying for. It is best to visit the official website for up-to-date information on application deadlines.

How can I track the status of my application to Boland TVET College?

You can track the status of your application to Boland TVET College by logging into your online application account or contacting the admissions office.

What should I do if I encounter technical issues while applying online?

If you encounter technical issues while applying online, you can contact the Boland TVET College IT support team for assistance.

Can I apply to Boland TVET College if I am an international student?

Yes, international students can apply to Boland TVET College. However, they must meet the relevant admission requirements and obtain the necessary study permits.

What programs are available for online application at Boland TVET College?

The programs available for online application at Boland TVET College vary from year to year. It is best to visit the official website for up-to-date information on available programs.

Can I apply for more than one program at Boland TVET College?

Yes, you can apply for more than one program at Boland TVET College. However, you will need to pay a separate application fee for each program.

How long does it take to receive a response to my application to Boland TVET College?

The length of time it takes to receive a response to your application to Boland TVET College varies depending on the program you are applying for. However, in general, you can expect to receive a response within a few weeks of submitting your application.
